00022 const ValuePtrConverterMap &ValuePtrBase::converters()
00023 {
00024     return util::Singletons::get<_internal::ValuePtrConverterMap, 0>();

00026 
00027 const ValuePtrBase::Converter &ValuePtrBase::getConverterTo( unsigned short ID )const
00028 {
00029     const ValuePtrConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( getTypeID() );
00030     LOG_IF( f1 == converters().end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[getTypeID()];
00031     const ValuePtrConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2 = f1->second.find( ID );
00032     LOG_IF( f2 == f1->second.end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[getTypeID()] << " to " << util::getTypeMap()[ID];
00033     return f2->second;
00034 }
00035 
00036 size_t ValuePtrBase::compare( const ValuePtrBase &comp )const
00037 {
00038     LOG_IF( getLength() != comp.getLength(), Runtime, info ) << "Comparing data of different length. The difference will be added to the returned value.";
00039     return getLength() - comp.getLength() + compare( 0, std::min( getLength(), comp.getLength() ) - 1, comp, 0 );
00040 }

00042 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::copyToNewByID( unsigned short ID ) const
00043 {
00044     return copyToNewByID( ID, getScalingTo( ID ) );

00046 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::copyToNewByID( unsigned short ID, const scaling_pair &scaling ) const
00047 {
00048     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( ID );
00049 
00050     if( conv ) {
00051         boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase> ret;
00052         conv->generate( *this, ret, scaling );
00053         return *ret;
00054     } else {
00055         LOG( Runtime, error )
00056                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00057                 << util::MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[ID] );
00058         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::createById( unsigned short id, size_t len )
00063 {
00064     const ValuePtrConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( id );
00065     ValuePtrConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2;
00066 
00067     // try to get a converter to convert the requestet type into itself - they 're there for all known types
00068     if( f1 != converters().end() && ( f2 = f1->second.find( id ) ) != f1->second.end() ) {
00069         const _internal::ValuePtrConverterBase &conv = *( f2->second );
00070         boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase> ret;
00071         conv.create( ret, len );
00072         return *ret;
00073     } else {
00074         LOG( Debug, error ) << "There is no known creator for " << util::getTypeMap()[id];
00075         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00076     }
00077 }

00079 void ValuePtrBase::copyRange( size_t start, size_t end, ValuePtrBase &dst, size_t dst_start )const
00080 {
00081     assert( start <= end );
00082     const size_t len = end - start + 1;
00083     LOG_IF( ! dst.isSameType( *this ), Debug, error )
00084             << "Copying into a ValuePtr of different type. Its " << dst.getTypeName() << " not " << getTypeName();
00085 
00086     if( end >= getLength() ) {
00087         LOG( Runtime, error )
00088                 << "End of the range (" << end << ") is behind the end of this ValuePtr (" << getLength() << ")";
00089     } else if( len + dst_start > dst.getLength() ) {
00090         LOG( Runtime, error )
00091                 << "End of the range (" << len + dst_start << ") is behind the end of the destination (" << dst.getLength() << ")";
00092     } else {
00093         boost::shared_ptr<void> daddr = dst.getRawAddress().lock();
00094         boost::shared_ptr<void> saddr = getRawAddress().lock();
00095         const size_t soffset = bytesPerElem() * start; //source offset in bytes
00096         const int8_t *const  src = ( int8_t * )saddr.get();
00097         const size_t doffset = bytesPerElem() * dst_start;//destination offset in bytes
00098         int8_t *const  dest = ( int8_t * )daddr.get();
00099         const size_t blength = len * bytesPerElem();//length in bytes
00100         memcpy( dest + doffset, src + soffset, blength );
00101     }
00102 }

00104 scaling_pair ValuePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00105 {
00106     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00107     assert( ! ( minmax.first.isEmpty() || minmax.second.isEmpty() ) );
00108     return ValuePtrBase::getScalingTo( typeID, minmax, scaleopt );
00109 }
00110 
00111 scaling_pair ValuePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, const std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> &minmax, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00112 {
00113     LOG_IF( minmax.first.isEmpty() || minmax.second.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "One of the ValueReference's in minmax is empty(). This will crash...";
00114     return getScalingTo( typeID, *minmax.first, *minmax.second, scaleopt );
00115 }
00116 
00117 scaling_pair ValuePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, const util::_internal::ValueBase &min, const util::_internal::ValueBase &max, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00118 {
00119     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( typeID );
00120 
00121     if ( conv ) {
00122         return conv->getScaling( min, max, scaleopt );
00123     } else {
00124         LOG( Runtime, error )
00125                 << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( getTypeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[typeID] );
00126         return scaling_pair();
00127     }
00128 }
00129 bool ValuePtrBase::convertTo( ValuePtrBase &dst )const
00130 {
00131     return convertTo( dst, getScalingTo( dst.getTypeID() ) );
00132 }
00133 bool ValuePtrBase::convertTo( ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &scaling ) const
00134 {
00135     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( dst.getTypeID() );
00136 
00137     if ( conv ) {
00138         conv->convert( *this, dst, scaling );
00139         return true;
00140     } else {
00141         LOG( Runtime, error )
00142                 << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( getTypeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( dst.getTypeName() );
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 }
